Description: A Breakdance . Ride spins on a platform with a group of pods that spin in addition to the platform
Antique cars that run along a track . The ride was remodeled due to the construction of the rollercoaster Greezed Lightning
Spinning ride that goes over slopes and flat area in a circular direction
Ride was previously located at Kings Island from 1973 to 1990
The park 's main Carousel . Formerly International Carousel
A white water raft ride . Parts of the ride were moved from the closed Opryland theme park . First ride added by Six Flags . Formerly The Penguin 's Blizzard River
A 129 foot tall drop tower ride
Zamperla Discovery Revolution ride . A circle of 16 passenger seats spins in a circle while swinging in the air doing 360 degrees loop
130-foot swing ride . Starts on the ground and lifts into the air where it swings riders
A high-speed thrill ride with a seven-story loop , continuous rotations and inversions , and forward and backward motions
Zamperla Endeavour ride . Open air , suspended passenger vehicles give riders the sensation of flying sixty feet through the air at 25 miles per hour Replaced Enterprise
